text:
I am a self-driven cybersecurity student and continuous learner, specializing in cyber defense and ethical hacking, with additional expertise in web development.
I develop my skills through daily hands-on practice and real-world projects on platforms such as Hack The Box, TryHackMe, and TCM Security.
I am proud to not be chasing the 'HR Filter' certifications. I only pursue practical, hands-on certifications that closely mimic real-world cybersecurity environments and tasks.
I aim to prove that success does not require conventional theory-heavy learning or MCQ-based tests.
